Professional Identification.Name: NPI
Professional Identification.Description: Unique clinician ID assigned by NPPES

Professional Identification.Name: Ind_PAC_ID
Professional Identification.Description: Unique individual clinician ID assigned by PECOS

Professional Identification.Name: Ind_enrl_ID
Professional Identification.Description: Enrollment ID Unique ID for the clinician enrollment that is the source for the data in the observation

Medical Credentials.Name: Cred
Medical Credentials.Description: Medical credential such as MD, DO, DPM, etc.

Medical Credentials.Name: Grd_yr
Medical Credentials.Description: Individual clinician’s medical school graduation year

Medical Credentials.Name: Pri_spec
Medical Credentials.Description: Primary medical specialty reported by the individual clinician in the selected enrollment

Medical Credentials.Name: Sec_spec_1
Medical Credentials.Description: First secondary medical specialty reported by the individual clinician in the selected enrollment

Medical Credentials.Name: Sec_spec_2
Medical Credentials.Description: Second secondary medical specialty reported by the individual clinician in the selected enrollment

Medical Credentials.Name: Sec_spec_3
Medical Credentials.Description: Third secondary medical specialty reported by the individual clinician in the selected enrollment

Medical Credentials.Name: Sec_spec_4
Medical Credentials.Description: Fourth secondary medical specialty reported by the individual clinician in the selected enrollment

Medical Credentials.Name: Sec_spec_all
Medical Credentials.Description: All secondary medical specialty reported by the individual clinician in the selected enrollment

Medical Practice.Name: Org_nm
Medical Practice.Description: Legal name of the group that the individual clinician works with – will be blank if the address is not linked to a group

Medical Practice.Name: Org_PAC_ID
Medical Practice.Description: Unique group ID assigned by PECOS to the group that the individual clinician works with – will be blank if the address is not linked to a group

Medical Practice.Name: num_org_mem
Medical Practice.Description: Total number of individual clinicians affiliated with the group based on Group Practice PAC ID

Medical Practice.Name: adr_ln_1
Medical Practice.Description: Group or individual's line 1 address

Medical Practice.Name: adr_ln_2
Medical Practice.Description: Group or individual's line 2 address

Medical Practice.Name: ln_2_sprs
Medical Practice.Description: Marker that address as reported may be incomplete

Medical Practice.Name: cty
Medical Practice.Description: Group or individual's city

Medical Practice.Name: st
Medical Practice.Description: Group or individual's state

Medical Practice.Name: zip
Medical Practice.Description: Group or individual's ZIP code (9 digits when available)

Medical Practice.Name: phn_numbr
Medical Practice.Description: Phone number is listed only when there is a single phone number available for the address

Medical Practice.Name: hosp_afl_1
Medical Practice.Description: Medicare CCN of hospital where individual clinician provides service

Medical Practice.Name: hosp_afl_lbn_1
Medical Practice.Description: Name of hospital, as it appears on Care Compare, where individual clinician provides service

Medical Practice.Name: hosp_afl_2
Medical Practice.Description: Medicare CCN of hospital where individual clinician provides service

Medical Practice.Name: hosp_afl_lbn_2
Medical Practice.Description: Name of hospital, as it appears on Care Compare, where individual clinician provides service

Medical Practice.Name: hosp_afl_3
Medical Practice.Description: Medicare CCN of hospital where individual clinician provides service

Medical Practice.Name: hosp_afl_lbn_3
Medical Practice.Description: Name of hospital, as it appears on Care Compare, where individual clinician provides service

Medical Practice.Name: hosp_afl_4
Medical Practice.Description: Medicare CCN of hospital where individual clinician provides service

Medical Practice.Name: hosp_afl_lbn_4
Medical Practice.Description: Name of hospital, as it appears on Care Compare, where individual clinician provides service

Medical Practice.Name: hosp_afl_5
Medical Practice.Description: Medicare CCN of hospital where individual clinician provides service

Medical Practice.Name: hosp_afl_lbn_5
Medical Practice.Description: Name of hospital, as it appears on Care Compare, where individual clinician provides service

Medicare Assignment.Name: assgn
Medicare Assignment.Description: Indicator for whether clinician accepts Medicare approved amount as payment in full Y = Clinician accepts Medicare approved amount as payment in full M = Clinician may accept Medicare Assignment

Medicare Assignment.Name: grp_assgn
Medicare Assignment.Description: Indicator for whether group accepts Medicare approved amount as payment in full Y = Group accepts Medicare approved amount as payment in full M = Group may accept Medicare Assignment

Reference.Name: adrs_id
Reference.Description: Unique identifier for the practice location; offices within the same building, but varied by suite or floor will have the same Address ID aside from the final two characters
